messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Is it ok to send you guys a prototype weapon we made? If so send us a message and we will send it via the cargo console.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We are sending the weapon via cargo now, it only has one shot

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Make sure to give us a review of the power of the blast cannon.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We are using a specially made bomb to power the wave of very high power.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a pack of rodents have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Have you tested our blast cannon yet? We are looking for feedback as to its power.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Recall and i blow your brains out
